name: Founders Time
slogan: We interview founders of AI/ML start ups
description: Founders Time’s mission is to help entrepreneurs share their learnings and experiences with others. This will help everyone to build more successful companies faster. Currently, we are focusing on the AI and machine learning space, creating unique content: blog posts, podcasts, video interviews and events. Since launching in 2018, we have interviewed founders of 10 different start ups, ranging from pre-seed to Series A. We are now looking to expand our team of two to allow us to share more founders stories with the world.

jobs.title: Copywriter / Blogger (AI, ML, Startups)
jobs.description:
About Founders Time:
Founders Time’s mission is to help entrepreneurs share their learnings and experiences with others. This will help everyone to build more successful companies faster. Currently, we are focusing on the AI and machine learning space, creating unique content: blog posts, podcasts, video interviews and events. Since launching in 2018, we have interviewed founders of 10 different start ups, ranging from pre-seed to Series A. We are now looking to expand our team of two to allow us to share more founders stories with the world.

About the Role:
We are looking for Copywriter / Blogger to assist us with the creation of written content, currently hosted on Medium (https://medium.com/@founderstime). We post monthly regarding new startups launched (https://medium.com/@founderstime/ai-ml-start-ups-launched-in-uk-july-2018-91059a641397), meet ups (https://medium.com/@founderstime/upcoming-ai-ml-meet-ups-in-london-august-september-18-475cb52a8d25) and jobs (https://medium.com/@founderstime/who-is-hiring-work-with-ai-ml-founders-in-london-july-18-4d4776ec54ce), as well as summaries of our video interviews (https://medium.com/@founderstime/interviewing-rael-cline-co-founder-and-ceo-of-mediagamma-key-takeaways-21b787447ea) . We are also keen to further expand the creation of unique posts, similar to our list of AI movies (https://medium.com/@founderstime/80-films-with-artificial-intelligence-1d71676def13). For example, writing about different members of AI community, general trends and recent news in the AI, ML and data science space.

You need to be able to commit around 10-20 hours a week and be available to meet weekly in London. This is a great opportunity for someone looking to break into VC world or learn from founders in the AI/ML space.

You should:
  -  Be passionate about startups, machine learning, artificial intelligence and its impact on the society
  -  Have prior experience of writing content on any topic that you are interested in
  -  Always be thinking outside the box and ready to suggest new content ideas
  -  Be comfortable to work both quantitative and qualitative data when necessary
  -  Be ready to research and find the necessary pieces of information online
  -  Be willing to get your hands dirty and to work without much direction with a possibility of failure
